text.div:
openIMISFHIRR4

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

https://openimis.github.io/openimis_fhir_r4_ig/ImplementationGuide/openimis.fhir.r4

This IG is about the mapping and usage of FHIR R4 to integrate openIMIS with other external systems.

name: openIMISFHIRR4
title: openIMIS FHIR R4 Implementation Guide
description: This IG is about the mapping and usage of FHIR R4 to integrate openIMIS with other external systems.

resource.name: openIMIS ActivityDefinition
resource.description: Defines a ActivityDefinition for openIMIS which maps to a Medical Service.

resource.name: openIMIS Claim
resource.description: Defines a Claim for openIMIS which maps to a Claim.

resource.name: openIMIS Claim Administrator Practitioner
resource.description: Defines a Practitioner for openIMIS which maps to a Claim Administrator.

resource.name: openIMIS Claim Administrator Practitioner Role
resource.description: Defines a Claim Administrator Practitioner Role for openIMIS.

resource.name: openIMIS Claim Response
resource.description: Defines a ClaimResponse for openIMIS which maps to a Claim. The ClaimResponse resource contains the adjudication result of a Claim.

resource.name: openIMIS Communication
resource.description: Defines a Communication for openIMIS which maps to the Feedback in openIMIS.

resource.name: openIMIS CommunicationRequest
resource.description: Defines a CommunicationRequest for openIMIS which maps to the Claim request for feedback in openIMIS.

resource.name: openIMIS Contract
resource.description: Defines a Contract for openIMIS use to enrol a Family/Group. Mapped mostly to Policy and will link Group/Family and Patient/Insurees.

resource.name: openIMIS Coverage
resource.description: Defines a Coverage for openIMIS which maps to a Policy.

resource.name: openIMIS CoverageEligibilityRequest
resource.description: Defines a CoverageEligibilityRequest for openIMIS to enquire an Insuree.

resource.name: openIMIS CoverageEligibilityResponse
resource.description: Defines a CoverageEligibilityResponse for openIMIS to get the enquire information for an Insuree.

resource.name: openIMIS Enrolment Officer Practitioner
resource.description: Defines a Practitioner for openIMIS which maps to an Enrolment Officer.

resource.name: openIMIS Enrolment Officer Practitioner Role
resource.description: Defines a Enrolment Officer Practitioner Role for openIMIS.

resource.name: openIMIS Group
resource.description: Defines a Group for openIMIS which maps to an Family

resource.name: openIMIS Health Facility Organization
resource.description: Defines an Organization for openIMIS which maps to a Health Facility

resource.name: openIMIS Insurance Plan
resource.description: Defines an Insurance Plan for openIMIS which maps to a Product.

resource.name: openIMIS Invoice
resource.description: Defines an Invoice for openIMIS.

resource.name: openIMIS Location
resource.description: Defines a Location for openIMIS which maps to a Location

resource.name: openIMIS Medication
resource.description: Defines a Medication for openIMIS which maps to a Medical Item.

resource.name: openIMIS Patient
resource.description: Defines a Patient for openIMIS which maps to an Insuree

resource.name: openIMIS Policy Holder Organization
resource.description: Defines an Organization for openIMIS which maps to a Policy Holder under Formal Sector scheme.

resource.name: Location Reference (Address)
resource.description: The reference to address' location for City/Village level.

resource.name: Municipality (Address)
resource.description: The location level between District and City/Village.

resource.name: Item Reference (Claim)
resource.description: The reference to the Medication or ActivityDefinition for an item within a Claim.

resource.name: Payload Type (CommunicationRequest | Communication)
resource.description: Indicates the payload type for a Communication.

resource.name: Premium (Contract)
resource.description: Indicates a premium for a Contract. This is a complex extension.

resource.name: Policy Status (Coverage)
resource.description: Indicates the policy status for a Coverage.

resource.name: Date (Coverage)
resource.description: Indicates a date for a Coverage.

resource.name: Poverty Status (Group)
resource.description: Whether the Group has the poverty status.

resource.name: Confirmation (Group)
resource.description: Indicates the confirmation for the Group.

resource.name: Poverty Status (Group)
resource.description: Whether the Group has the poverty status.

resource.name: Group Type (Group)
resource.description: Indicates the type of the Group. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.

resource.name: Conversion Product (InsurancePlan)
resource.description: Reference to the product which replaces the current product in case of renewal after the period end.

resource.name: Discount (InsurancePlan)
resource.description: Defines the discount to be applied for enrolment and renewal in InsurancePlan.

resource.name: Max Installments (InsurancePlan)
resource.description: Maximal number of instalments in which contributions for a policy may be paid.

resource.name: Period (InsurancePlan)
resource.description: Defines the number of months a certain period is valid in InsurancePlan.

resource.name: Cycle Start (InsurancePlan)
resource.description: Defines the starting date for a new cycle in InsurancePlan.

resource.name: Frequency (Medication)
resource.description: The frequency a Medication can be prescribed.

resource.name: Medication Type (Medication)
resource.description: Indicates the Item type for the Medication.

resource.name: UsageContext (Medication)
resource.description: The Context a Medication can be prescribed.

resource.name: Legal Forms (Organization)
resource.description: Indicates the legal forms of the Health Facility Organization.

resource.name: Health Facility Level (Organization)
resource.description: Indicates the level of the Health Facility (Organization).

resource.name: Activity (Organization)
resource.description: Indicates the activity of the PolicyHolder Organization. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.

resource.name: Legal Forms (Organization)
resource.description: Indicates the legal forms of the PolicyHolder Organization.

resource.name: Card Issued (Patient)
resource.description: Whether a card was issued to the Patient/Insuree during enrolment.

resource.name: Education Level (Patient)
resource.description: Specifies the Patient/Insuree's education level

resource.name: Group Reference (Patient)
resource.description: The reference to the Group/Family the Patient/Insuree is part of.

resource.name: Identification (Patient)
resource.description: Specifies the Patient/Insuree official identification and the type of identification document.

resource.name: IsHead (Patient)
resource.description: Whether the Patient/Insuree is the Head of the Family.

resource.name: Profession (Patient)
resource.description: Specifies the Patient/Insuree's profession

resource.name: Vulnerability Status (Patient)
resource.description: Whether the Patient/Insuree has the vulnerability status.

resource.name: Substitution Reference (PractitionerRole)
resource.description: The reference to the Enrolment Officer that will substitute the current one after the period end.

resource.name: Unit Price (Medication|ActivityDefinition)
resource.description: The unit price for a Medication or ActivityDefinition.

resource.name: Service Type (ActivityDefinition)
resource.description: Indicates the Service Type for an ActivityDefinition. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

resource.name: Usage Context Type (ActivityDefinition)
resource.description: Indicates the Usage Context Type for an ActivityDefinition.

resource.name: Usage Context for Venue Type (ActivityDefinition)
resource.description: Indicates the Usage Context for Venue Type for an ActivityDefinition.

resource.name: Usage Context for Workflow Type (ActivityDefinition)
resource.description: Indicates the Usage Context for Workflow Type for an ActivityDefinition. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

resource.name: Category of the item (Claim)
resource.description: Indicates the category for the item under a Claim. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

resource.name: Rejection reasons (Claim)
resource.description:
Indicates the rejection reason of an item from a Claim. 
Values limited by openIMIS.

resource.name: Status of the claim (Claim|ClaimResponse)
resource.description: Indicates the status of the Claim. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

resource.name: Category of the supporting info (Claim)
resource.description: Indicates the category for the supportiong info under a Claim. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

resource.name: Visit Type Codes (Claim)
resource.description:
Indicates the visit type of the Claim. 
Values limited by openIMIS.

resource.name: Claim Feedback Status (CommunicationRequest)
resource.description: Indicates the status of a feedback (Claim).

resource.name: Premium Category (Contract)
resource.description: Indicates the category of the premium for the Contract. Cannot be extended.

resource.name: Premium Payer (Contract)
resource.description: Indicates the payer of the premium for the Contract. Can be extended in openIMIS. Need to match openIMIS database payer list.

resource.name: Premium Type (Contract)
resource.description: Indicates the type of the premium for the Contract. Cannot be extended.

resource.name: Resource Party Role (Contract)
resource.description: Indicates the participant engagement type for the Contract term.

resource.name: Scope (Contract)
resource.description: Indicates the scope for the Contract. Values defined by openIMIS. Cannot be extended.

resource.name: Status Codes (Contract)
resource.description: Indicates the status of the Contract. Values limited by openIMIS.

resource.name: Type of benefit as amount left (Coverage)
resource.description: Indicates the type of benefit under a Coverage. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

resource.name: Type of benefit (Coverage)
resource.description: Indicates the type of benefit under a Coverage. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

resource.name: Type of benefit as total left (Coverage)
resource.description: Indicates the type of benefit under a Coverage. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

resource.name: Partial categories of the item (Coverage)
resource.description: Indicates the category for the item, only for medical items and services, under a Coverage. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

resource.name: Category of the item (Coverage)
resource.description: Indicates the category for the item under a Coverage. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

resource.name: Coverage Status (Coverage)
resource.description: Indicates the status of a Coverage (Policy).

resource.name: ICD 10 Level 1 diagnosis
resource.description: Example of diagnosis to be used with Claim resource. The actual list is configured in openIMIS.

resource.name: Feedback Payload (CommunicationRequest | Communication)
resource.description: Indicates the Feedback Payload code for a CommunicationRequest and Communication. List defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

resource.name: Feedback Status (CommunicationRequest)
resource.description: Indicates the Feedback Status for a CommunicationRequest. Partial list defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

resource.name: Confirmation Types (Group)
resource.description: Indicates the confirmation type for the Group. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.

resource.name: Group Types (Group)
resource.description: Indicates the type of the Group. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.

resource.name: Coverage Benefit Limit Types (InsurancePlan)
resource.description: Indicates the Coverage Benefit Limit Types for an InsurancePlan. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

resource.name: Coverage Type (InsurancePlan)
resource.description: Indicates the Coverage Type for an InsurancePlan.

resource.name: General Cost Type (InsurancePlan)
resource.description: Indicates the General Cost Type for an InsurancePlan. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

resource.name: Publication Status (InsurancePlan)
resource.description: Indicates the Publication Status for an InsurancePlan.

resource.name: ChargeItem (Invoice)
resource.description: Indicates the ChargeItem for a lineItem from an Invoice. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

resource.name: PriceComponent Type (Invoice)
resource.description: Indicates the Type for a PriceComponent from an Invoice.

resource.name: Type (Invoice)
resource.description: Indicates the Type for an Invoice. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

resource.name: Location Type (Location)
resource.description: Indicates the location type. Values defined by openIMIS. Cannot be extended.

resource.name: Item Type (Medication)
resource.description: Indicates the Medical Item Type for an Medication. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

resource.name: openIMIS Identifiers Value Set
resource.description: Indicates the Identifier type

resource.name: Legal Forms (Organization)
resource.description: Indicates the legal forms of the Health Facility Organization. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.

resource.name: Health Facility Level (Organization)
resource.description: Indicates the level of the Health Facility (Organization). Values defined by openIMIS. Cannot be extended.

resource.name: Activity (Organization)
resource.description: Indicates the activity of the PolicyHolder Organization. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.

resource.name: Legal Forms (Organization)
resource.description: Indicates the legal forms of the PolicyHolder Organization. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.

resource.name: Contact Relationship (Patient)
resource.description: Indicates the Relationship of a Patient with the Head of the Family.

resource.name: Education Level (Patient)
resource.description: Indicates the Education level of a Patient

resource.name: Identification Types (Patient)
resource.description: Indicates the type of document the Patient used to identify himself.

resource.name: Marital Status (Patient)
resource.description: Indicates the Marital status of a Patient

resource.name: Patient Profession Value Set
resource.description: Indicates the profession of a Patient

resource.name: Practitioner Qualification Type
resource.description: Indicates the Qualification Type of a Practitioner.

resource.name: Usage Context for Age Type (ActivityDefinition|Medication)
resource.description: Indicates the Usage Context for Age Type for an ActivityDefinition or Medication.

resource.name: Usage Context for Gender Type (ActivityDefinition|Medication)
resource.description: Indicates the Usage Context for Gender Type for an ActivityDefinition or Medication.

resource.name: Service Type (ActivityDefinition)
resource.description: Indicates the Service Type for an ActivityDefinition. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

resource.name: Usage Context for Workflow Type (ActivityDefinition)
resource.description: Indicates the Usage Context for Workflow Type for an ActivityDefinition. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

resource.name: Category of the item (Claim)
resource.description: Indicates the category for the item under a Claim. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

resource.description:
Indicates the rejection reason of an item from a Claim. 
Values limited by openIMIS.

resource.description: Indicates the category for the supportiong info under a Claim. Values defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

Indicates the visit type of the Claim.

resource.description: Indicates the Feedback Status for a CommunicationRequest. Partial list defined by openIMIS. Can not be extended.

resource.description: Indicates the confirmation type for the Group. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.

resource.name: Group Types (Group)
resource.description: Indicates the type of the Group. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.

resource.description: Indicates the legal forms of the Organization. Values defined by openIMIS. Can be extended.
